directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook rotini at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes. Drain.
Mix cooked pasta, peas, lemon juice, vegan mayonnaise, coconut, pistachios, garlic, dill, and sea salt together in a large bowl until well combined.
title: Tropical Vegan Pasta Salad
